name: Find all users with an active Azure role

queryList.query: MATCH (all_az_scopes) WHERE (all_az_scopes:_VAR_all-az-scopes) MATCH p = (:AZUser)-[r]->(all_az_scopes) RETURN p

name: Find all groups with an active Azure role

queryList.query: MATCH (all_az_scopes) WHERE (all_az_scopes:_VAR_all-az-scopes) MATCH p = (:AZGroup)-[r]->(all_az_scopes) RETURN p

name: Find all dynamic groups with an active Azure role

queryList.query: MATCH (g) WHERE EXISTS(g.membershipRule) MATCH (all_az_scopes) WHERE (all_az_scopes:_VAR_all-az-scopes) MATCH p = (g)-[r]->(all_az_scopes) RETURN p
